text: Xɛrane yi siga mangan nun a kuntigine bataxine ra Isirayila nun Yuda yamanan yiren birin yi, alo mangana a yamarixi kii naxan yi. E naxa, “Ɛ tan Isirayila kaane, ɛ xɛtɛ Alatala ma, Iburahimaa Ala, Isiyagaa Ala, Isirayilaa Ala alogo a mɔn xa xɛtɛ ɛ ma, ɛ tan yamaan muxu dɔnxɛn naxanye luxi ɛ nii ra, ɛ tan naxanye tangaxi Asiriya mangane ma.
